snippet: The university would not say how many students had been disciplined for cheating, but its statements indicated that the number forced out was around 70.
abstract: Harvard University forces dozens of students to withdraw for cheating on take-home final exam given in May 2012 in government class, one of largest scandals in school's memory; university's statement does not address assertions that blame rests partly with a professor and his teaching assistants.
lead_paragraph: The university would not say how many students had been disciplined for cheating, but its statements indicated that the number forced out was around 70.

headline.seo: Harvard Forced Dozens to Leave in Cheating Scandal
